name: TableColumnSelector
desc: The object for defining conditions that will cause a conditional style to be applied to a column.

items.name: columnIndex
items.desc: A number that specifies a column index. The leftmost column of data has an index of 0. Only the column with the specific index is selected.

items.name: descriptor
items.desc: A number that specifies the identifier of a specific data descriptor. All columns for this data descriptor are selected. See DataDescriptor.When dataOrientation is set to vertical, which is the default, each column displays data for one data descriptor. See DataTable.

items.name: even
items.desc: A Boolean value when true, selects the even columns.

items.name: odd
items.desc: A Boolean value when true, selects the odd columns.
